message.original:
レスタニアには、覚者や住民に襲い来る 多くの敵が徘徊しています 巨大なもの、群れを成すもの 毒や魔力を持つもの、夜間や雨天のみ 登場するものなどさまざまです
<COL ffdc78>レベル（Ｌｖ）が高い敵ほど強力です</COL> 自分のレベルと合った敵と戦いましょう
message.translation:
There are many hostile enemies throughout Lestania. Giant monsters, creatures that hunt in packs, foes that would use magic or poison, and even some that only appear during rain, or at night.
<COL ffdc78>Level（Ｌｖ）dictates the strength of a foe.</COL> Mind that you fight enemies near your own level.

message.original:
Defeating enemies yields you <COL ffdc78>Experience（ＸＰ）</COL>with which to level up. Enemies may occasionally drop items. Proactively fight your enemies!
<COL ffdc78>Each enemy has its own weak points that receive extra damage.</COL> Find your enemies' weak points and strike them to gain an upper hand.
